field.name: max_number_of_urls
field.label: Max number of urls displayed
field.description: How many urls should be included in the list, at most

field.name: min_segment_length
field.label: Min url segment to use
field.description: Minimum number of character of an url segment to include in the search

field.name: include_pdf
field.label: Include pdf links
field.description: If set to Yes, links to pdf version of pages may be included in similar urls displayed

field.name: include_print
field.label: Include print links
field.description: If set to Yes, links to printable version of pages may be included in similar urls displayed

field.name: excluded_words_sef
field.label: Exclude SEF urls containing
field.description: Exclude similar urls which SEF version contains the words listed here (one word per line)

field.name: excluded_words_non_sef
field.label: Exclude non SEF urls containing
field.description: Exclude similar urls which NON-SEF version contains the words listed here (one word per line). For instance, type option=com_user to exclude any link to the com_user component to be shown
